SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sign up to the WOM Platform
SIGN_UP.SUBTITLE: Fill in the form below to sign up to the WOM Platform as a Merchant, in order to start receiving payments.

MERCHANT.TITLE: MERCHANT
MERCHANT.NAME: Merchant/Business Name
MERCHANT.DESCRIPTION_TEXT: Short description of your business and how you intend to monetize WOM Vouchers (goods or services).

POS.TITLE: Your first Point of Service
POS.SUBTITLE_A: Fill out this part of the form in order to create a Point of Service (POS) instance for your Merchant account. You will be able to receive WOM payments straight away using your POS.
POS.SUBTITLE_B: You will be able to create additional Points of Service after sign up.
POS.NAME: Name
POS.NAME_TEXT: POS name, will be shown to users while performing a payment.
POS.URL_OPTIONAL_TEXT: Optional. Will be shown to users when the payment is confirmed. Can be used to show more information about the POS of the Merchant.
